title: Update Asset Record After Repair
description: A maintenance crew has just repaired a broken water pump. An operator must update the asset's records.

tasks.description: Receive a completed work order for the repair of 'Water Pump #4'.
Locate 'Water Pump #4' in the asset management database.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct asset record.

tasks.description: Add a new entry to the asset's maintenance history, detailing the repair work done and the date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the maintenance log for the asset.
